actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to prohibit the Federal Aviation Administration from conveying any property interest to any operator of the Atlantic City Airport, Pomona, New Jersey, and to preclude the availability of funds to any such operator for airport improvements, until certain planning and operating conditions have been met. Exempts safety considerations from such funding limitation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982, and for other purposes.
